name: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 ReMix Limited Edition
summary: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 ReMIX is an HD remastered compilation of Kingdom Hearts II Final Mix and Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep Final Mix. Previously exclusive to Japan, both games will be available for the first time across Europe and PAL regions for the PlayStation3 system. HD remastered cinematics from Kingdom Hearts Re:coded will also be included in the compilation. The game is a sequel to last year's Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 ReMIX and will lead into the highly anticipated Kingdom Hearts III.;The Kingdom Heartssaga continues with three magical journeys in one package!
